Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Spherical vase, with a short straight neck and a depression at the bottom of the vessel that deviates to the side (manufacturing flaw?), made from a red clay with an orange-yellow slip. A geometrical design is comprised of two red-orange bands, one at the base of the neck the other on the body. The middle orange-yellow band is surrounded by two black lines with a decoration of signs.
